com.chunfeng.handler

类 PermissionRouterControllerHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chunfeng.handler.PermissionRouterControllerHandler
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.springframework.security.access.AccessDecisionManager

    @Component
public class PermissionRouterControllerHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.security.access.AccessDecisionManager
    权限路由控制(路由判断)

    此类是SpringSecurity动态授权的核心逻辑处理类，需要通过PermissionRouterSetHandler 进行配置后，通过返回的配置对象与用于当前用户拥有的权限进行比较，从而判断用户是否有权

    作者:
    by 春风能解释

    2023/7/30

      • decide

        public void decide(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication,
                   java.lang.Object object,
                   java.util.Collection<org.springframework.security.access.ConfigAttribute> configAttributes)
            throws org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException,
                   org.springframework.security.authentication.InsufficientAuthenticationException
        判断是否有权访问
        指定者:
        decide 在接口中 org.springframework.security.access.AccessDecisionManager
        参数:
        authentication - 权限对象
        object - 当前路由
        configAttributes - 已配置的权限配置
        抛出:
        org.springframework.security.authentication.InsufficientAuthenticationException - 访问拒绝,未拥有充足的权限
        org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException

      • supports

        public boolean supports(org.springframework.security.access.ConfigAttribute attribute)
        是否能处理ConfigAttribute
        指定者:
        supports 在接口中 org.springframework.security.access.AccessDecisionManager
        参数:
        attribute - 权限配置对象
        返回:
        如果能处理则返回true

      • supports

        public boolean supports(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)

        返回:
